turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Tribal Wars.
turn.1: How long does it take to upgrade buildings in Tribal Wars?
turn.2: Each building level has a longer base time for completion, though the amount of time a building upgrade actually takes for completion is dependent upon the level of the "Village Headquarters" A higher HQ level provides faster building upgrades.
turn.3: What do higher level buildings do?
turn.4: Higher levels troop production buildings, such as barracks, stable, and workshop facilitate faster recruitment speeds.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: It is not unusual for some actions to take hours, perhaps even days, to complete.
turn.7: Why do some actions take so long?
turn.8: Because the game takes place in real time many of the game's tactics are based on precision timing execution.
turn.9: What kind of tactics are used?
turn.10: For example, a common tactic to conquer an opponent's village is known as a "noble train" whereby an attacker sends multiple attacks in rapid succession with the first attack containing a full attack force (clearing out any defenses that may be in the village), while the subsequent attacks contain only one nobleman and a light escort, which will be able to land successfully after defenses have been eliminated.
turn.12: This method is necessary due to the fact that conquering a village requires lowering its loyalty from 100 percent to zero and each successful attacking nobleman lowers a village's loyalty by a randomly generated amount between 20 and 35 percent, while only one nobleman can be effective in a single attack command.
